message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $130. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand that you think the product is valuable, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time I'm thinking more along the lines of $115. Can we meet at this price?

I'm starting to think that $125 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to make one last offer, and I'm thinking of $110. If you're willing to sell it to me for that price, I'll make it worth your while
